title: Grow Your Seed Vocabulary: Key Terms Every Gardener Should Know

tasks.task: Understand seed catalog terminology and their implications for gardening.
subtasks: Recognize the difference between organic and non-GMO seeds.
Identify heirloom seeds and their significance.
Understand the term 'treated seeds' and their purpose.
Learn about pelleted seeds and their benefits.
Differentiate between open pollinated and hybrid seeds.
Note the importance of saving seeds from open pollinated plants.
Understand the concept of parthenocarpic plants.
Explore the significance of days to maturity (DTM) in seed catalogs.
Consider USDA zone hardiness when selecting plants.
Analyze growth habits and terms like determinate and indeterminate.
Interpret resistance ratings in seed descriptions.
Evaluate bolt resistance in heat-sensitive plants.
Assess crack resistance in tomatoes and its importance.
Understand field holding time and its relevance.
Consider growth rate descriptions when planning garden布局.
Appreciate uniformity in plant characteristics for specific uses.
Recognize and appreciate flavor descriptors in seed catalogs.
